title: Creamy white chocolate cheesecake
ingredients: ['100g digestive biscuits (approx 7 each)', '70g porridge oat flakes (Mornflake super fast)', '1 teaspoon cocoa powder, sifted', '75g unsalted butter, melted', '20-25g white chocolate, melted (4 chunks)', '300g soft cheese (1/2 or full fat)', '125g caster sugar', '300ml double cream, whipped to stiff peaks', '150g white chocolate, melted', '10-12g (1 sachet) gelatine mixed with 120ml hot water', 'chocolate flakes for decoration (optional)']
